{"id":427829335,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1607265753,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/427829335/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Concatenation of Consecutive Binary Numbers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    string fans =\"\";\n    \n    void solve(int n){\n        string t=\"\";\n        while(n){\n            t +=  ('0'+ (n%2 == 1));\n            n=n/2;\n        }\n        reverse(t.begin(),t.end());\n        \n        fans += t;\n    }\n    int concatenatedBinary(int n) {\n        int mod = 1e9+7;\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 1;i<=n;i++){\n            solve(i);\n        }\n        for(char c : fans){\n            ans = ans*2%mod;\n            ans += (c-'0');\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"concatenation-of-consecutive-binary-numbers"}
